page.title: 05CANON PYON & DISTRICT W.I.
page.content: Our W.I. has just celebrated it's second 21st.Birthday! It was disbanded in 1960 but began again in 1964. The membership averages about 20 members, mainly middle-class ladies over 30 years of age.Winter meetings are not well attended mainly because the Village Hall is cold. Our branch has a good reputation for culinary skills, and is in great demand to provide refreshments for fetes, festivals etc.We try to help our local community, running "Meals on Wheels" and a Community Service Scheme whereby anyone in trouble can telephone for help from a list of members.Help can range from collecting medicine, taking people to hospital, to delivering wreaths to a cemetery in another village! We have recently won two drama awards, and take part in darts, rounders and scrabble tournaments.
